goal: "IHC Mining, part of the Royal IHC group, focuses on integrated solutions for mineral processing, onshore, nearshore, marine mining and tunnelling. Besides determining overall technical and economic project viability, IHC Mining also offers stand-alone products. It designs, builds and supplies innovative mining vessels and advanced equipment, ranging from tunnelling systems, mining dredgers and crawlers, slurry transport systems and mineral separation plants to plant automation and control systems. The experienced IHC Mining team consists of geologists, engineers (mechanical, mining, geotechnical, processing and environmental), technicians and other specialists. IHC Mining is in a unique position as a global player in its industries and strongly believes in an integrated approach throughout the mining life cycle to achieve the best results for the mining and tunnelling operation. This results in a continuous search for cooperation with the relevant stakeholders such as customers, suppliers, academia and NGO's. IHC Mining understands the importance of clear and sound advice to support customers in the development and operation of their projects. The company offers advisory services throughout the mining and tunnelling value chain. A track record in alluvial- and marine mining projects allows IHC Mining to provide tailor-made advisory services for (among others) mineral sands, gold, tin, diamonds and tailings. Based on in-house knowledge and activities in the marine environment IHC Mining is guiding the way in deep-sea mining development. In this new area of the industry, IHC Mining provides a suite of services focused on the management of efficient and effective development programmes to realize the potential of the mineral deposits in a sustainable way. Three hundred years of experience in shallow water excavation and slurry transport using centrifugal pumping, combined with new technologies is the foundation for marine mining to develop and provide turnkey integrated systems for marine mining applications. IHC Mining also provides tunnelling systems ranging from 500-3,000mm in diameter which are designed for all soil and rock types. IHC Mining uses the in-house expertise for engineering and manufacturing available within the Royal IHC group of companies and business partners. IHC Miningâ€™s advanced marine mining services and equipment range makes it possible to provide customers with an integrated marine mining and tunnelling systems from ocean floor to surface, resulting in an optimal production performance."
